description: has a great scanner and channel guide, and record guide
it Should be default video player in KDE Neon .. its very simple and easy to use
Watching Tv is excellent
The app opens and you can listen to the sound but there isn't any image and you can't stop playing without quitting the app.

I love that it downloads guide data with no configuration, simply by watching a show.

Improvements needed are:
1) option to store guide data during recording
2) simple way to prime the guide data using crontab
3) crontab start of GUI appears to be needed for the scheduled recordings to work
4) login while recording on same user, seems to lose the first part of the show that was recording

Kaffeine 2.0.15 - Debian 10
h999d good goood good

As this application is based on VLC it shares a bug that leaves part of this
software active in the background when closing.
Always make sure that you stopped playing before closing the application. 
Scanning of DVBT channels is easy it would be nice if the result was shared 
between all users may be in the form of an m3u file.
It's lightweight, simple and easy to use. I use it for watching satellite tv. One thing that's missing is option to manually scan frequencies
summary: very good but still room for improvement

description: Kaffeine has been our family's only TV/DVR for many years now. Easy to configure and use; and, it has been most reliable. It interfaces perfectly with our Hauppauge 950Q tuner for reception of US ATSC HD broadcasting.

I've been looking for a player that will connect to my DVB-T USB stick and this program worked perfectly when others have failed. The setup was simple and the layout on screen is pleasing to navigate. This will now be my favoured TV player. Thanks and keep up the good work!!
Not perfect with video playback but good enough
summary: The only DVB tuner for linux and it's from kde

description: here's a laugh. new to linux so placed a dvd in the ole laptop and of course the title pops up You Can't Watch This. Yeah I thought that was linux player saying you can't watch this. Kaffeine to the rescue. Turns out I could watch, You can't watch this, by infowars Alex Jones

Auto Scan produces no scan results. Realtek RTL2832 (DVB-T) is detected. It was working fine few days ago and stopped working from 13th Jun 2021.Tried different USB ports got same result. w-scan results with 
ERROR: Sorry - i couldn't get any working frequency/transponder
 Nothing to scan!!
This works better on my TV Card than the official windows software

Plugged my old DVB USB stick in, fired up Kaffeine, did the channel scan. Just worked. Excellent

(Kubuntu 21.04, KDE Plasma 5.21.4)
This just works. Tried using this when VLC dissapointed me (crashing when i open a video file), and it just works.
the best software on linux for watching dvb-t & dvb-s.
summary: the best software on linux for watching dvb-t & dvb-s

description: Too many bugs. Building a playlist does not work. Imported a playlist I made in another media player and discovered the skip button always breaks after the 4th use. You must restart app to reset this bug.
summary: Promising at first glance, but ultimately disappoints

description:
kaffeine 2.0.18 crashes after recent automatic update on kubuntu 20.0.4
Executable: kaffeine PID: 4762 Signal: Segmentation fault (11) Time: 04.04.22 11:32:46
Worked fine for years with Tevii S660 DVB S2
No idea how to get it work again

Der Sendersuchlauf findet auf ASTRA 19.2E nicht alles (aber das, was für mich wesentlich ist) oder liefert in wenigen Fällen unbrauchbare Daten, so dass man den Kanal doch nicht anwählen kann.
Schade, dass es seit fast 2 Jahren kein Update gibt. Ich habe Version 2.0.18-1ubuntu1 installiert.

Nach sehr langer Zeit habe ich es nun endlich mit Hilfe von Kaffeine geschafft, dass ich unter Ubuntu fernsehen kann. Danke!
Die Wiedergabe ist flüssig. Bei einem Versuch mit Windows 10 und der Software WinTV 8.5 hat es dagegen gerucklt - weiß der Himmel, warum.
Ich verwende (Dez. 2019): Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS, Hauppauge PCTV 292e Triplestick, DVB-C in München/M-Net.
Man muss erst einen Zugang einrichten, externe TV-Karte o.ä.
summary: Dachte das ginge direkt übers Internet, war nichts..

description:
Seit Ubuntu 20.10 funktioniert Kaffeine leider nur noch unter Gnome mit Wayland sauber. Unter Plasma mit Wayland wird der vlc Media Player gestartet und Kaffeine crashed dann sogar nach kurzer Zeit.

Und ohne Wayland ist die Bildausgabe fehlerhaft.
fernsehen geht ohne teletext und andere medien holperig

El video no reproduce sonido.
Video plays without sound.
summary: No hay sonido, solo el vídeo. No sound, only video

description: Excelente para ver TDT
reproduce video 4k sin parpadeos, va perfecto
Es genial reproduce todo video y audio con muy buena calidad
Muy buena aplicacion ,muy fluida
me fascina esta joya
Tres compler je recommande.

Moi je veux juste une application qui me permet une lecture des musiques
avec la liste des musiques et des contrôles 'passer la musique' ou 'pause' mais j'ai PAS réussi mettre mes musiques dans une liste qui les prends et lit au pif.
Après il y a pas mal d'options mais je voulais juste une lecture de musiques quoi.
Fonctionne parfaitement avec un stick haupauge USB pour regarder la TNT.
en plus c'est un peu complexe mais c'est peut être parce que ça ne fonctionnait pas
summary: ne fonctionne pas avec xubuntu 18.04.05 LTS

description:
(Kaffeine a une interface conviviale, de sorte que même les novices peuvent lire leurs films immédiatement : à partir d'un DVD (incluant les menus, titres, chapitres, etc.), d'un VCD, ou d'un fichier.)
Je suis novice et je n'est pas réussi à m'en servir, ni pour les DVDs, ni pour la TV.
summary: ne lit pas les DVDs commercial

description: Проще и надёжнее (стабильнее) чем VLC. Загружается быстрее, отлично воспроизводит DVD из папки. С этим у linux`ойдов всегда проблемы.
ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt
Такое себе... NPV
依赖里有vlc我直接安装vlc就行了，搞笑呢
